title: Hotel Italia
description: Hotel with non-veg restaurant but has a vegan-friendly section in the breakfast buffet. Includes fresh fruits, cereals, muesli, bread and jam, juices--all marked with a "V OK." Could ask the waiter for soy milk and soy cappuccino, vegan croissant and biscuits, vegetable butter, organic jam, and fair trade brown sugar. The complimentary personal care products in the rooms are all cruelty-free. The hotel spreads vegan brochures.
